description: Worked on multiple projects using a range of technologies to develop and maintain reliable, high-performance radar simulation software for air traffic control systems.
Assisted students in mastering data structures and Java through lab facilitation, assignment evaluation, and one-on-one support, including debugging and troubleshooting.

Supported daily operations in a fast-paced environment by delivering exceptional customer service, training new team members, and improving equipment reliability and service efficiency through hands-on problem-solving and process enhancements.
